Dear Mrs. Newman:
Thank you for your April 11 letter
concerning legislation now before Congress
I appreciate your giving me the benefit of
your thinking on the services of educa¬
tional radio and I will certainly keep
your views firmly in mind when matters
in this field come before the Congress.
I am certainly open minded to any amend¬
ment to the bill and I would be happy to
talk with you or your Executive Director
about this should you or Mr. Sandler
call upon me.
I appreciate your writing,
kindest regards.
With
Sincerely,/^'"') ) ^
